"Katsuragi": "Thank you very much. Here's a brief explanation."
"Just like in other regions, we have confirmed the presence of Regional Mags here in Stia as well."
"Currently, I've been looking into what effects they bestow, but..."
"When I ask the other troops for their assistance, they've all had their hands full with other missions..."
"The war effort has been going on for some time now, and we've not made as much progress as we would have liked..."
"But recently I've heard tales of your exploits, so I was wondering if I could ask you for your help."
"Whenever you have some free time, could I ask that you record some data from the Regional Mags?"
"The location will be at Strobol Island, here in Stia's Fringes."
"All you'd have to do is feed an item to the Regional Mag there."
